title: Software Test Engineer
body:
Our client is a global leader in the design and distribution of innovative implantable medical devices that improve the quality of life of patients all over the globe. To support the development and evolution of new products, our client has tasked us with identifying and recruiting a talented Software Test Engineer to be based in Austria.

Key responsibilities of the position will involve:

  • Create and maintain test cases and test plans for medical device software and mobile medical apps
  • Implement and maintain automated software tests using C#
  • Perform manual and exploratory software tests
  • Manage test environments
  • Review requirement specifications


Interested candidates should closely match the following reference profile:

  • Degree-level education or equivalent in a technical or information/computer sciences field
  • 2+ years of experience with test case design, test automation, database testing
  • Experience in web/mobile application security testing
  • Good programming skills in an object-oriented high-level language
  • Proficiency in English
  • Team player with excellent communication, interpersonal, analytical and problem-solving skills
